reviewText: Intelligent Swedish police drama with a low key, humanstic approach to solving crimes.  I'm halfway through the series and have enjoyed every episode.
I've written several reviews of sets of these Wallander mysteries.  All are excellent.  I am looking foward to pre-ordering the 2013 season.
I have other sets of Wallender mysteries.  It is worth buying an all-region DVD player to be able to play these Swedish movies in the U.S.

Amazon made possible to get this great series. Although shipped from another continent the movie arrived in due time, as announced and in perfect condition.
To be able to watch it in a PAL system I purchesed( from Amazon, of course)the zone free blu ray player. It is worth the money.
Excellent stories and acting, the subtitles are no problem,and the image quality is superb. More should be made for the USA

This is a GREAT police series. Set in a small town in Sweden, it is gritty and hard hitting. The lead actor is excellent as is the supporting cast. Subtitles are clear and make sense!
 I highly recommend this series.
